definition: (once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
to want to say sth but then hesitate
having given away a bride, to lose one's army on top of it (idiom)/to suffer a double loss after trying to trick the enemy
pinyin: pei2 le5 fu1 ren2 you4 zhe2 bing1

definition: mystery within a mystery/the mysteries of the Dao according to Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3]
before the first wave subsides, a new wave rises (idiom); a new problem arises before the old is solved/many twists and turns to a story/one thing after another
pinyin: yi1 bo1 wei4 ping2 , yi1 bo1 you4 qi3

definition: also known as/alternative name/to also be called
to make a lot of noise/to be disorderly
to make a lot of noise/to be disorderly
lit. to lead the life of a whore but still want a monument put up to one's chastity (idiom)/fig. to have bad intentions but still want a good reputation/to want to have one's cake and eat it too
pinyin: you4 xiang3 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 xiang3 li4 pai2 fang1
containing_words.word: 又想當婊子又想立牌坊

definition: lit. to lead the life of a whore but still want a monument put up to one's chastity (idiom)/fig. to have bad intentions but still want a good reputation/to want to have one's cake and eat it too
pinyin: you4 xiang3 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 xiang3 li4 pai2 fang1
containing_words.word: 又想當婊子又想立牌坊

sentences.english: "I'm so glad to see you, " said Carrie, pleased and yet nonplussed.
sentences.chinese: “看見你我太高興了，”嘉莉說，既高興又爲難。

sentences.english: LX, do you see in the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 樓下的，又看見你在上網了。

sentences.english: Hot summer days are coming while the high-grade summer goods will raise another heat wave.
sentences.chinese: 伏天將臨，夏日精晶將掀起又一個熱季狂潮。

sentences.english: Clean and bright, You look happy to meet me.
sentences.chinese: 小而白，潔又亮，見到我你面露喜色。

sentences.english: Lemons contain pectin fiber, which assists in fighting hunger cravings.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬富含果膠纖維，它又可以抵抗飢餓。

sentences.english: Should we dispatch cadres to help exercise regional national autonomy?
sentences.chinese: 又比如實行民族區域自治，我們派不派幹部？

sentences.english: She returned to the hearth, and frankly extended her hand.
sentences.chinese: 她又回到爐邊，坦率地伸出她的手。

sentences.english: And why do we fall for it, year after year?
sentences.chinese: 而我們又爲什麼年復一年爲之傾倒？

sentences.english: However, even resist to all tin not do it, again He Tan resists.
sentences.chinese: 然而，連抗拒都做不到，又何談反抗。

sentences.english: But i heard you are the best.
sentences.chinese: 在某個領域裏最優秀，卻又不以此自矜。

sentences.english: At the same time, Shafei has the devil character to save herself .
sentences.chinese: 同時，莎菲又有自救反抗的魔性。
更換的系統模塊又一次重新安裝。

sentences.english: The clever thing was to break the rules and stay alive all the same .
sentences.chinese: 聰明的做法，是把規矩破得巧，同時又得活得好。

sentences.english: This month Iran arrested several more bloggers.
sentences.chinese: 本月伊朗又逮捕了多名博主。

sentences.english: He had cleared them out three years ago but they had all come back in again.
sentences.chinese: 祂三年前曾經把他們趕出去，但不久又回覆舊觀。

definition: to watch from a height or distance/to survey
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
